about.name: isodate
about.caption: Tune the output format of dates language dependent.

description.abstract: This package provides ten output formats of the commands \today, \printdate, \printdateTeX, and \daterange (partly language dependent): ISO (yyyy-mm-dd), numeric (e.g. dd.\,mm.~yyyy), short (e.g. dd.\,mm.\,yy), TeX (yyyy/mm/dd), original (e.g. dd. mmm yyyy), short original (e.g. dd. mmm yy), as well as numerical formats with Roman numerals for the month. The commands \printdate and \printdateTeX print any date. The command \daterange prints a date range and leaves out unnecessary year or month entries.
